[4]It all boils down to today.  For you seniors, this marks the culmination of your past four years.  Think of what that means to you.  Are you guys gonna look back on your days at East and know that you made the most of the time you had? 
[5]Now that's the attitude, Ostreicher! 
[6]Christ!  I didn't say you were out of the game! 
[7]What the fuck is this?  You got someplace more important to be?
dialogues.JIM'S MOM:
[1]Hey, Jimmy.  I just wanted to say sweet dreams. 
[2]Kiss goodnight. 
[3]Is something wrong with the reception? 
[4]I think he's trying to watch one of the illegal channels. 
[5]Oh my God! 
[6]Jim?  Honey, where are you going?
dialogues.SOPHOMORE CHICK:
[1]God, I can't believe there are so many cool people at this party. 
[2]Thanks. 
[3]Really? 
[4]I don't know if I want to be doing this. 
[5]You know.  If we hook up, tomorrow I'll just be some girl you go telling all your friends about. 
[6]Steve!  You could at least look at me when you say that.
dialogues.STIFLER'S BROTHER:
[1]Steve!  Steve!  It's my computer and I wanna use it! 
[2]This is like the coolest thing I've ever seen. 
[3]What happened?!  What happened?! 
[4]You guys are gonna fuck, aren't you!? 
[5]Fuckers fuckers fuckers fuckers! 
[6]That was awesome!
